message: Let's split it down the middle, fair and square!
I'll give you a decent chunk, but I want a bigger share
You wanted more, but I'm not giving up that much!
I'll give you a small share, but I'm taking the majority
You're not getting all the cake, Bob!
I'm getting close to the majority, but I'll give you a tiny bit
You're getting desperate, Bob. Time to make a real offer!
I'm not giving up, Alice. You're getting a tiny share
You're running out of time, Bob. This is my final offer!
I'm not giving up yet, Alice. You're getting a tiny, tiny share
You're out of options, Bob. Take it or leave it!
I'd rather get nothing than give you almost all the money
